DOC.criteria: Stomach lesion > 10mm Lesion limit mucosal and/or submucosal layer ( T1 lesion ) Aged 18 year old Lesion less 10mm Stomach lesion involve muscularis propria ( T2 lesion ) stag modality endoscopic ultrasonography ( EUS ) Aged young 18 year
